alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 8:56PM PST until December 18 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with local gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Gusty winds may occur in the Cajon and Banning Passes today. Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will begin to ease tonight into Saturday morning. Another cold morning is expected on Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills
